name: @growingio/cra-template-boost
description: a create-react-app template for gio frontend
author: GrowingIO Frontend Team <eng-frontend@growingio.com>

scripts.husky:init: husky set .husky/prepare-commit-msg 'exec < /dev/tty && ./node_modules/.bin/cz --hook || true'&& husky set .husky/commit-msg 'npx --no-install commitlint --edit "$1"'&& husky set .husky/pre-commit 'npm run prettier'
